question: Which is the first Indian airport to launch an exclusive terminal for processing and storage of agro and pharma products?
explanation:
Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport, Mumbai recently announced the launch of an exclusive terminal for processing and storage of agro and pharma products.
The airport is operated by GVK led consortium and Airports Authority of India. The terminal can hold over 700 tonnes of cargo at one time and is claimed as the largest airport-based temperature-controlled facility in the world.
